value.title: StarCraft 2: AlphaStar (Artificial Intelligence) vs Grand Master League!
value.excerpt: AlphaStar has been playing on the StarCraft 2 ladder over the last few months. Recently the Google DeepMind team that has been developing this artificial intelligence released a blog post, a research paper and a replay pack about the AI.  Get more videos & support my work: http://www.patreon.com/lowkotv

value.title: StarCraft 2: Clem's Terran vs Zerg is INSANE! (Solar vs Clem)
value.excerpt: Professional match of StarCraft 2 between Solar and Clem. In this Terran versus Zerg we watch Clem take control of the early game, but Solar managed to stay alive and strikes back in the late game.  Support my work on Patreon: http://www.patreon.com/lowkotv Become a YouTube member: https://lowko.tv/join

value.title: StarCraft 2: GAME OF THE YEAR! (Dark vs Cure)
value.excerpt: One of the best games of StarCraft 2 I've ever seen. This game between Dark (Zerg) and Cure (Terran) is so close that it's still not clear who's winning at the 45 minute mark, it was played as part of the Korean StarCraft League (the KSL). https://patreon.com/koreanstarcraftleague/  Support my work:

value.title: StarCraft 2: GREAT SERIES - Serral vs Maru! (Best-of-5)
value.excerpt: A best-of-5 series between the best players that StarCraft 2 has to offer. In this video I cast a Zerg versus Terran in SC2 between Serral, the current World Champion of StarCraft, and Maru, the most succesful player from South Korea.
